column1: standing in abandoned asylum corridor, shadows writhing on walls
in cemetery at midnight, fog creeping between tombstones
at basement entrance, flickering bulb casting eerie shadows
in haunted house doorway, floorboards creaking ominously
beside old well, dark water reflecting no light
in attic filled with covered furniture, dust motes dancing
at forest edge where no birds sing, trees twisted and gnarled
in medical examination room, instruments gleaming menacingly
beside broken mirror, multiple reflections showing different horrors
in subway tunnel, distant screaming echoing from darkness
at abandoned carnival, rides still and silent
in old church, stained glass windows depicting torment
beside hospital bed, life support machines beeping erratically
in school hallway, lockers hanging open like gaping mouths
at cliff edge, storm clouds gathering with unnatural speed
